subject: Order #SSN2398 Order Issue – Request for Refund
description_text:
Good Afternoon,

I have received my order of the *Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor – Pedals
Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (VAM Pro Set, 3-pack with power
supply)*. However, there was an issue with the shipment. I ordered one set,
but two items were sent to me.

This is similar to a previous issue we experienced regarding shipping. At
that time, I agreed to cover an additional shipping cost of *$20 USD* due
to the high fee to Hawaii (347.3 RMB ≈ $50 USD).

Given the current mistake, I would like to request a refund for the extra
item that was sent. Since I already paid the additional shipping fee, I
would appreciate it if the refund could reflect the smaller adjusted amount
we previously agreed upon.

Please confirm how we can proceed. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Mark Crider

I have attached a screenshot of the two orders I made, but you sent me two sets, and I only need one. I am okay with getting a refund for the lower amount, which we agreed to pay the additional shipping costs for.
Any updates? I love the product, but i don't have plans to keep two of them.

Hi Mcrider,    Sorry, we can't process your return, as you repurchased one item in your second order,so our warehouse staff dispatched both items directly to you. And we do not maintain a warehouse in Hawaii and are therefore unable to handle returns.  We can offer you a refund of $20 as compensation. Perhaps you could sell it to someone else? Would that be acceptable?

Thank you for your response. I’d like to clarify my position regarding the
extra item:

   -

   I am willing to pay the additional $20 or what ever the cost may be to
   return the item to its original origin.
   -

   According to my tracking information, the shipment originated from *Elgin,
   IL 60124*.
   -

   Since I have no use for an extra system, I kindly ask for either:
   -

      Instructions on how I can return the item (with me covering the
      shipping), *or*
      -

      A higher compensation amount than $20, as selling the extra unit is
      beyond my capabilities.

I appreciate your assistance and hope we can reach a fair resolution.

Best regards,

Mark

On Mon, Sep 22, 2025 at 12:40 AM service@simsonn.com

I guess i'll take that offer since there no other way " refund of $20 as
compensation"
